newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Guests toast Chinese bride and groom with heroin.
newsitem.headline: Guests toast Chinese bride and groom with heroin.

text.p: Guests toasted the health of the bride and groom at a wedding in China with heroin instead of champagne, a Hong Kong newspaper said on Sunday.

The newly-weds were addicts and treated guests at their wedding in the western city of Chongqing with the drug bought with a wedding gift of cash from their parents, the Chinese-language Ming Pao newspaper said.
The paper said the celebration came to an abrupt halt when police burst in and arrested the couple.
They were both sent to drug rehabilitation centres, the newspaper said.
